meanings.sent1: The clown's daftest antics made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: It was the daftest thing I had ever heard.
meanings.sent3: His daftest jokes always lightened the mood.
meanings.sent4: The daftest puppy in the litter was always getting into trouble.
meanings.sent5: The daftest hat at the party was a bright pink cowboy hat.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of good sense
meanings.sent1: Her daftest decision was to wear flip-flops in the snow.
meanings.sent2: Ignoring the warning signs was the daftest move he could make.
meanings.sent3: The daftest choice he made was to try to pet a wild squirrel.
meanings.sent4: It was the daftest idea to go swimming in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The daftest driver on the road was the one reading a book.
